actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Environment and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To require information on the contents of sludge to be provided to purchasers of the sludge and the public.

summary.text: Sludge Disclosure Act of 2005 - Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to require any person who sells or transfers sludge from a waste treatment plant for agricultural or related purposes to disclose to purchasers and the public information on the source and content of such sludge.

titles.title: To require information on the contents of sludge to be provided to purchasers of the sludge and the public.
